Nonbreeding.description: Nonbreeding Chestnut-collared Longspurs lack the Lark Bunting's white wing edges, which are visible on both nonbreeding males and females. Chestnut-collared also lacks the female Lark Bunting's white-and-black mustache stripe.

Female.description: Longspurs have smaller bills than Lark Buntings. Female McCown's Longspurs have a cleaner chest and face than female and nonbreeding male Lark Buntings.
